typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		name as string,
		other as integer,
		num_col as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OracleInput
OracleInput derive(Added_column = 1,
		other = toString(other)) ~> AdditionalColumn
